name: Red Running Hood
description:
IMPORTANT: This game was made for the Manasoup Game Jam over the course of a week end

Red Running Hood is a runner game combined with a boss fight. 

Like the game?  Follow me on twitter

You are trying to run away from the bad, big wolf chasing you right behind while trying to avoid obstacles.
But fear not, there is way to defeat him!

Occasionally, you will find a poison mushroom, throw it in order for him to eat it - but watch out!
You need to avoid the mushroom as well, otherwise you might just end up hurting yourself.

Controls:
[Space] OR [Left Mouse Click]

Languages available:
German
English

BGM:
"Face Deafeat 98bpm" - DarkChiptune

SFX:
InterfaceSFX
AcientGameSound by ESM Team
sfx-the-ultimate-2017-16-bit-mini-pack by phoenix1291
